attributes.action: TO INVOKE THE ROYAL PREROGATIVE and REFUSE ROYAL ASSENT IN ORDER TO PREVENT OUR ARMED FORCES GOING TO WAR AGAINST  SYRIA/IRAN UNDER ANY PRETEXT
attributes.additional_details:
WE  PETITION HER MAJESTY, QUEEN ELIZABETH THE SECOND, TO INTERCEDE ON BEHALF OF ALL PEACE LOVING PEOPLE IN THE UNITED KINGDOM AND COMMONWEALTH AND INVOKE HER  ROYAL PREROGATIVE BY REFUSING TO SIGN THE “ROYAL ASSENT” NEEDED BY THIS WAR-MONGERING ERRANT AND MISGUIDED GOVERNMENT, IN ORDER TO PREVENT IT FROM SENDING ANY OF THE  ARMED FORCES OF THE UNITED KINGDOM TO WAR AGAINST THE SOVEREIGN NATIONS OF SYRIA AND/OR IRAN UNDER ANY PRETEXT WHATSOEVER.

WE MAINTAIN: -

THAT ALL WARS ARE FINANCIAL IN NATURE
THAT ALL WARS ARE PLANNED AND NEVER ACCIDENTAL
THAT THE FEW PLAN THEM FOR THE MANY AND THE FEW BENEFIT
THAT OUR BORDERS ARE NOT THREATENED .
THAT THERE IS NO LAWFUL OR MORAL EXCUSE TO WAGE MORE WAR.
THAT THERE ARE NO WEAPONS OF MASS DESTRUCTION IN IRAN
THAT WAR HAS NEVER SOLVED ANYTHING AND NEVER WILL.
THAT WE MUST FREE OURSELVES FROM THE LIMITING  MIND-SET WHICH SEES WAR AS A  JUSTIFIABLE OR ACCEPTABLE MEANS OF BEHAVIOR
